eta.transducers.gpt.GPTSubplanTransducer

class GPTSubplanTransducer[source]

Bases: GPTTransducer, SubplanTransducer

Methods

cost

Get the accumulated cost of applying a GPT transducer within a session.
__call__(step)[source]

Generate a result for some input using GPT.

Parameters:

  • kwargs (dict) – A dict mapping placeholders in the prompt to values (which may be strings or lists of strings).

  • stop (list[str], optional) – A list of stop sequences to pass to GPT.

Returns:

The output of the validator functions after generation (which may be processed further by the specific transducer instance).

Return type:

str or list[str]

cost()

Get the accumulated cost of applying a GPT transducer within a session.
